name: Spiffy's Adventures in Tax Evasion
description:
Spiffy's Adventures in Tax Evasion

The IRS is after him. Help Spiffy avoid paying taxes! I mean, why wouldn't you?

------

No, this is not a serious game. My friends told me to make the stupidest game for class I could, and this is what we came up with. Spiffy is the only character that is mine.

Controls: Text box
